page.title: 08CHANGING TIMES
page.content: When Mr White came across to school he told us all about the school .He said the desks were like chess boards and we had a bell on top of our school.The rope came down into class two and the bell ringer came at 8.45, then he would ring the bell at 9.00.Some people had to come from Tollerton to school.Part of our class room could be made into a stage,but it is all painted over and stuck now.They didn't wear a uniform in those days.In the infants class they wrote in sand and when they moved up into into a different class they used slate and a piece of chalk to write with.If anyone was naughty,a boy would get the cane and a girl would get a slap on the wrist.
